projects.title: VPP Personal Dashboard
projects.project_description: Fully customizable personal dashboard designed dynamically to fit the needs of a specific employee, no matter what department they’re in, this dashboard contains information beneficial to the individual using it. The main purpose of this dashboard is to help our employees to see and get to information at a quick glance.
features: Rearrangeable widgets containing specific data (production, deployments, repairs, etc.)

projects.title: QuickQuote
projects.project_description: E-commerce site to allow customers to place orders/get quotes on the technology devices the company provides.
features: Search field to search for a specific item
Search field to search for a previously generated quotes

projects.title: Search Tracker
projects.project_description: Search tracking application for users to track down and get detailed information (description, progress, warranties, history) on a device that is being repaired by the company.
features: Countdown/Indicator to show warranty is still active or expired

projects.title: Label Generator
projects.project_description: Label generating application to allow users to create and customize shipping labels.
features: Set of defined templates to choose from
Add, edit, delete, and save label events
Download event to print out labels

projects.title: Deployment Calendar
projects.project_description: This is a redesign of an existing deployment calendar application to show delivery destinations dedicated to a specific driver within the company.
projects.problem: The deploymeny calendar application that's being used isn't as dynamic or user friendly. Our user's would like a more interactive application that allows them to easily see the deployments they are assigned to, have the ability to search, and more viewing options then just the default calendar view. Improving this application will be able to increase delivery efficiency by 10%.
features: Search field to allow users to search for/jump to a specific delivery event within the calendar
Color coded delivery events based on delivery method
Hover capability on delivery events to give brief information of delivery and the driver(s) assigned to it

projects.title: vBid Analytics
projects.project_description: Analytic software that provides an in-depth overview of bids, wins etc., for the sales team – providing the company with accurate visual representations of the sale team’s performance.
features: Pie chart visual represention to show data dedicated to specific analytic the user wants to see
